content: Bord of Governors of the Federal Reserve System   9  January 19, 2017                                 Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System                           8  Figure 8 FOMC Participants’ Assessments of Appropriate Policy  and Prescriptions from Alternative Policy Rules  0.0  0.5  1.0  1.5  2.0  2.5  3.0  3.5  4.0  4.5  5.0  5.5  6.0  0.0  0.5  1.0  1.5  2.0  2.5  3.0  3.5  4.0  4.5  5.0  5.5  6.0 Taylor rule (R* = 1) Balanced-approach rule (R* = 1) Change rule Median of projections  2016 2017 2018 2019  December 2016 SEP projections Percent  Note: For the definition of the solid circles, see the note to Figure 5. Source: For the three rules, Federal Reserve Board staff calculations; for the projections (solid circles) and the medianof projections, Summary of Economic Projections (SEP), December 2016, available at www.federalreserve.gov/monetarypolicy/fomccalendars.htm.
